mapper.update: merge into SYS_RYRZ_LOG a using(select #{SQR} SQR, #{SQDW} SQDW, #{SQSJ} SQSJ, #{SQYX} SQYX, #{LOGINNAME} LOGINNAME, #{BZ} BZ, #{SQRGDDH} SQRGDDH, #{SQJS} SQJS, #{ZYLB} ZYLB from dual) b on (a.loginname=b.loginname) when matched then update set a.SQR=b.SQR, a.SQDW=b.SQDW, a.SQSJ=b.SQSJ, a.SQYX=b.SQYX, a.BZ=b.BZ, a.SQRGDDH=b.SQRGDDH, a.SQJS=b.SQJS, a.ZYLB=b.ZYLB when not matched then insert (a.SQR, a.SQDW, a.SQSJ, a.SQYX, a.LOGINNAME, a.BZ, a.SQRGDDH, a.SQJS, a.ZYLB) values(b.SQR, b.SQDW, b.SQSJ, b.SQYX, b.LOGINNAME, b.BZ, b.SQRGDDH, b.SQJS, b.ZYLB)
